title: Cap Anson Photos, Cabinet Cards For Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Cap Anson Photos, Cabinet Cards For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
The following items are for sale.

(2) Cap Anson Studio Photographs $275 each or $475 for both.  These are Guaranteed Authentic First Generation photos from Anson's estate.

Cabinet card of Chicago player in one of the best pitching poses I have seen.  I do not know the player.  $375

Cabinet card from the late 1870's of a familiar looking player that I can not seem to put my finger on.  Jersey says "(M/N/H)artville".  Gilded edge with bib front jersey and a Spalding Painted Barrell bat.  c. 1875-82.  $400


E Mail me if interested.

Rhys
